content.question: In the context of the poem as a whole, the paradox in line 1, “In a dark time, the eye begins to see,” establishes the speaker’s understanding that

choices.label: nature can offer solace for grief
clarity can come in times of distress

content.answer: clarity can come in times of distress

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how a character's own choices, actions, and speech reveal complexities in that character, and explain the function of those complexities.
